comment: Coach Padilla was all you could ask for in a professor and much more. The semester I took his class, something major happened in my life and he was there for me to offer not just support for the class, but support for me as a person as well.

attendance is required but can try to make up missed days in his other sessions; grading is based on pre- and post-skills test of push-ups, sit-ups, pull-ups, squats, & 1 mile also a handful of quizzes and workout progress for each topic covered; late work allowed but for deduction of points for each passing day; he is very funny & easy to talk to
Very Fun class, met a lot of good friends through this class. Quizzes are not hard. Highly recommend.

This class is for you not the grade. He is there to assist you when you need it. Great way to get into weight lifting and getting in shape. Coach is cool and really fun to talk to. There are a few questions out of the book that you have to answer for an assignment every so often but he posts the pages online. Show up, work out, and have fun!
COACH IS AWESOME TAKE HIM. SUPER COOL GUY KNOWS HIS STUFF. GRADES EASY

What a great coach/professor! This is his first time teaching at the collegiate level and he did a great job! Had a wonderful time in my soccer/team handball class. He made it fun for those who weren't athletes too!
